verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Here I am newline Humbled by your majesty, newline Covered by your grace so I'm free newline Here I am, Knowing im a sinful man, newline Covered by the blood of the lamb

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Now I've found, newline The greatest love of all is mine newline Since you laid down your life newline the Greatest sacrifice,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Majesty, Majesty, newline Your grace has found me just as I am newline Empty handed but alive in your hand

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Majesty, Majesty newline forever I am changed by your love, newline In the presence of your majesty..

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Here I am, humbled by the love that you give, newline Forgiven so that I can forgive, newline Here I stand, knowing that I'm your desire newline Sanctified by glory and fire.
